properties.areaDesc: Chesapeake Bay from Windmill Point to New Point Comfort VA
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 11 at 9:34AM EST until February 11 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Wakefield VA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southwest winds 15 to 20 knots with gusts to 25 knots.
Waves 2 to 3 feet.

* WHERE...Chesapeake Bay from Windmill Point to New Point
Comfort VA.

* WHEN...Until 4 PM EST this afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON
